channel.title: John Day-Burns Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in John Day-Burns Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-26 East/US-395 South Split - John Day
item.description: US-26 East/US-395 South Split in John Day. Turn right for US-395 south; continue straight for US-26 east. US-395 north joins US-26 westbound to Mount Vernon.

item.title: US-26 East/US-395 South Split - John Day
item.description: US-26 East/US-395 Split in John Day. Turn right for US-395 south to Canyon City and Burns. Continue east on US-26 for Baker City (via OR-7), and Vale.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North Approaching US-395
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North approaching US-395 north to John Day and Pendleton.

item.title: US-20 East at US-395 North
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North at US-395 North to John Day and Pendleton.

item.title: US-20 East at US-395 North
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North at US-395 North to John Day and Pendleton, and US-20 East to Vale and Ontario.

item.title: US-26 West at US-395 South
item.description: US-26 west at US-395 south to Canyon City and Burns. US-395 north joins US-26 west to Mt. Vernon.

item.title: US-20 West at US-395 Jct.
item.description: US-20/US-395 north junction to John Day and Pendleton on US-20 west

item.title: US-20 West at US-395 Jct.
item.description: Eben Ray Rd/Black Rock Rd Jct. on US-20 west at US-395 north jct

item.title: US-20 East Approaching US-395 North
item.description: US-20 east approaching US-395 junction in Burns.

item.title: US-26 East/US-395 Split - John Day
item.description: US-26 East/US-395 Split in John Day. Turn right for US-395 south to Canyon City and Burns. Continue east on US-26 for Prairie City, Baker City (via OR-7), and Vale.
